creditline: Anonymous gift in celebration of the 100th anniversary of the Minneapolis Institute of Art
description:
one silver CD-R disc in one clear jewel case; 3 sound collages, looped

untitled sound 1 (cicadas), untitled sound 2 (nature/Flaminia), untitled sound 3 (water)
disc says "C 2014 JoAnn Verburg. Do not make unauthorized copies. Untitled (so far). 3 sound pieces- to loop- to use- to return all copies"
title: 3 x SOUND (Fonti del Clitunno)
